name: A Thin Line (souljawild)
description:
Controls:

  • WASD / LR Arrow = Move.
  • Space / Up Arrow = Jump.
  • Esc / P = Pause

Objective:

Make it to the end of the level, collect love hearts or hate hearts the choice is yours in A Thin Line!

Original Assets Created With:

  • Blender (Hearts, Platforms, Walls)
  • FL Studio (Sounds)
  • Photoshop (Cover Image)
  • UE4 Materials (Hearts, Platforms)
  • UE4 Blueprints

Assets Used:

  •  UE4 Mannequin  & Animations
  •  UE4 Skybox
  •  UE4 Sidescroller WASD Input
  •  UE4 Default Game Mode
